thig3.2:1.3: I had failed to find peace of heart,
thig3.2:1.4: or any control over my mind.
thig3.2:2.4: the aggregates, sense fields, and elements.
thig3.2:3.1: When I had heard her teaching,
thig3.2:3.3: I sat cross-legged for seven days without moving,
thig3.2:3.4: given over to rapture and bliss.
thig3.2:3.5: On the eighth day I stretched out my feet,
thig3.2:3.6: having shattered the mass of darkness.
